description: Comprehensive review of React component patterns for CRUD operations across frontend

workstreams.findings: 52+ files with 345 modal instances, 93+ custom hooks

workstreams.description: Analyze component patterns, hooks usage, and structure
workstreams.findings: Mixed patterns, duplicate code, inconsistent form handling

workstreams.description: Validate TypeScript types and prop definitions
workstreams.findings: Good interfaces but 'any' types in tables, FormData loses type safety

workstreams.description: Identify performance issues and optimization opportunities
workstreams.findings: Missing memoization, no virtualization, inline functions
Report generated with specific examples and recommendations

decisions.decision: Focus on modal, form, and table patterns as primary areas
Prioritize shared component recommendations over refactoring
